item.title: Introduction - Gotz ETL - CodeTab
item.description: (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});   CodeTab Gotz ETL Gotz ETL is a tool to extract data from HTML pages. In Java, it’s easy to scrape web pages with libraries such as JSoup and HtmlUnit, but the task become daunting when we try to scrape data from huge set of pages. Some of the challenges while extracting large set of data from unstructured sources such as HTML pages are:
